# minCameraDistance

**Instance Property**

The minimum allowed distance of the camera from the center of the map in meters.

## Declaration

```swift
get minCameraDistance(): number;
```

## Setting minimum and maximum distances

- **maxCameraDistance**: The maximum allowed distance of the camera from the center of the map in meters.
